job_tasks.phrase: responsible for the innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly indicates the development of a software application (Digital Assistant).

job_tasks.phrase: create conversational experiences through web/app and voice channels
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of user-facing software applications across different channels.

job_tasks.phrase: develop and maintain: The conversational engine, a Python (Asyncio) backend that handles the connection with the digital assistant platform and for routing live chats and callbacks.
job_tasks.justification: This details the development and maintenance of backend services using specific technologies.

job_tasks.phrase: developing a React/Redux based front-end chat UI that communicates with the conversational engine, which lives on our website (kpn.com) and the mijnkpn apps.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly outlines front-end development for user interfaces within web and mobile applications.

job_tasks.phrase: work on a FastAPI based BFF that provides endpoints for the conversational platform to enrich the conversation with customer, product information and integration for specific use cases.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the development of backend services (BFF) with APIs for data enrichment and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: assist our sister teams with generating technical components within the conversational platform that they can use within their conversational content.
job_tasks.justification: This involves creating reusable software components for other teams.

job_tasks.phrase: adding integrations with KPN systems to improve the digital self-service capabilities
job_tasks.justification: This refers to developing integrations, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: strengthening the pivotal bridge function to our customer service department with new channels
job_tasks.justification: This implies developing or enhancing communication channels, a software development activity.
This involves developing features for voice interaction, a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.
job_tasks.justification: This signifies the development work to integrate AI into an existing software system.

job_tasks.phrase: play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the broader technical direction and architecture of software.

job_tasks.phrase: make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
job_tasks.justification: This relates to technical decision-making in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.
job_tasks.justification: While broad, 'automation' in the context of optimizing quality and speed often relates to CI/CD and MLOps practices in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: based on the latest conversational technology within the KPN ecosystem.
job_tasks.justification: This suggests working with and potentially fine-tuning or adapting existing conversational technologies, which falls under modeling.
This points to the use of natural language processing capabilities, often involving underlying models.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of exciting generative AI capabilities into our digital assistant.
job_tasks.justification: The integration of generative AI capabilities directly implies working with and adapting generative models.

soft_skills.phrase: innovation and development of our cutting-edge Digital Assistant.
innovating new use cases and services
play a leading role in shaping the direction of our technical development.
make architectural decisions and convince others of your views.
continuously optimizing quality and speed through automation.

classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes developing a digital assistant with conversational and generative AI capabilities, including integrating these into user-facing applications. While it involves significant software development tasks, the core focus on generative AI integration aligns best with the GenAI Engineer profile.
